_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
before^an8.30:12.4^where: the land of the Bhaggas on Crocodile Hill, in the deer park at Bhesakaḷā's Wood and the land of the Cetīs in the Eastern Bamboo Park.
where: the land of the Bhaggas on Crocodile Hill, in the deer park at Bhesakaḷā's Wood and the land of the Cetīs in the Eastern Bamboo Park.
before^an8.30:23.1^where: Eastern Bamboo Park in the land of the Cetīs and Bhesakaḷā's Wood in the land of the Bhaggas
